content: Since the movie title is in fact the direct and only answer to our original problem question “what is the winner of the Oscars Best Picture award?” I think we can confidently say that is a damn important line that mustn’t be missed. And so, I have chosen to make it the biggest line on the card. And while I was at it, I decided to drop the quotes because I felt the title was now sufficiently contrasted against the rest of the card that the quotes became superfluous.
